EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Virtual User Group Beta_2018.Approved Feb 19 Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed: February 19 PCF User Group Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hooray!
We’re looking forward to seeing you on February 19, 2019. Please {{my.Feb192019:default=click here}} to add this meeting to your calendar.
Here are the WebEx details: JOIN WEBEX MEETING https://pivotal.webex.com/pivotal/j.php?MTID=m7acf57236c547c124399a70a4ac97a18 <[[https://pivotal.webex.com/pivotal/j.php?MTID=m7acf57236c547c124399a70a4ac97a18]]> Meeting number: 641 767 385
To receive a call back, provide your phone number when you join the event, or call the number below and enter the access code.
Call-in toll-free number:
1-877-8818371 (US) 080 0032 0677 (UK) 08 00 94 86 56 (France) 08007 242990 (Germany)
Call-in number:
1-617-3374371 (US) +44 (0) 20 3457 4999 (UK) +33 (0) 157327043 (France) +49 (0) 69380 791131 (Germany)
Attendee access code:
759 510 08
Should you have any questions, please email Madison Schlegel at mschlegel@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mschlegel@pivotal.io]]>.
